Articles.Content:
Now that it's 30 minutes past when Suqadcast should have ended and there is no indication on Twitch that anything is going on, I'm going to assume that there will be no Squadcast tonight and instead they're going to save anything for the showoff tomorrow.

I won't be summarizing those, as I won't be watching them.

confirmed. show will start in roughly 10 hours.

too bad we wont have your summarizing. thats always informative.

Edit: Sorry I am hyped

Edited November 7, 2015 by MalfunctionM1Ke
I can sit through 1 hour of Max. I can't do 12 hours of random people not actually talking about what will be in the update.

I can sit through 1 hour of Max. I can't do 12 hours of random people not actually talking about what will be in the update.

That's what RoninPawn and Scott Manley are for. Who needs Twitch when you have YouTube.
